an7.95:1.1: “Sattime, bhikkhave, puggala ahuneyya …pe… dakkhineyya anjalikaraniya anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa.
an7.95:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo cakkhusmim aniccanupassi viharati aniccasanni aniccapatisamvedi satatam samitam abbokinnam cetasa adhimuccamano pannaya pariyogahamano.
an7.95:1.4: So asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati.
an7.95:1.5: Ayam kho, bhikkhave, pathamo puggalo ahuneyyo pahuneyyo …pe… anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa.
an7.95:2.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo cakkhusmim aniccanupassi viharati aniccasanni aniccapatisamvedi satatam samitam abbokinnam cetasa adhimuccamano pannaya pariyogahamano.
an7.95:2.2: Tassa apubbam acarimam asavapariyadananca hoti jivitapariyadananca.
an7.95:2.3: Ayam, bhikkhave, dutiyo puggalo ahuneyyo …pe… anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa.
an7.95:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo cakkhusmim aniccanupassi viharati aniccasanni aniccapatisamvedi satatam samitam abbokinnam cetasa adhimuccamano pannaya pariyogahamano.
an7.95:3.2: So pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya antaraparinibbayi hoti …pe…
an7.95:3.7: Ayam, bhikkhave, sattamo puggalo ahuneyyo …pe… anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa.
an7.95:3.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, satta puggala ahuneyya pahuneyya dakkhineyya anjalikaraniya anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa”ti.
